record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="link" and term="Link creation" and format.name="link.prompt" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: link
record.format.name: link.prompt

brief.brief: This is the first screen you see when you indicate the link maintenance utility. It prompts you to select a link record by entering a form name or system.
When you press Enter, the maintenance utility searches the link table for all records that meet the search criteria. Leaving the fields blank returns all records.
- If the query finds no records, it displays a message prompting you to add one.
- If the query finds one record, it displays the record.
- If the query finds many records, it displays a record list.

detail.detail: F3 (End): Takes you back to the menu.
